location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Tracing from Annexe Numéro V (to Anglo Turkish agreement of 1913). Map to show the Limit of Kuwait and Adjacent Countary’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing clothDimensions:201 x 241 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Tracing produced to show the location of Dohat Balbul (Dohat Balaibīl) within limits of Kuwait authority. The map partly copied from Annex no. 5 to unratified Anglo-Ottoman Convention of 29 July 1913 and enclosed to the letter dated February 8th 1919 from D.V. McCollum, Political Agent in Kuwait to the Civil Commissioner, Baghdad.The word 'Country' is misspelled in the title.
